snippet.title: USC: Counterforce - 1.0 Release trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574870/USC_Counterforce/?utm_source=releasetrailer

Lead your Space Commandos in a revival of turn-based squad tactics inspired by UFO/XCOM and Aliens. Utilize in-depth skill & combat systems in multiple game modes, including a full campaign. Discover the truth behind the demise of colony MC83-A and join the USC in defending humanity!

Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1574870/USC_Counterforce/
Official website - https://firesquid.games/games/usc-counterforce
Newsletter - https://bit.ly/USC_Counterforce_News
Twitter - https://twitter.com/USCtactics
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/firesquidgames/
Discord - https://discord.gg/vsxD6n8P8J

Trailer maker: Friday Afternoons
Voice actor: Thomas A.
Developed by Angry Cat Studios
Published by Firesquid
